Mod2_Description: When you Critically Strike, your {c_important}Wolves{/c} gain {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%+|]{/c} Attack Speed for {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.
Mod3_Description: {c_label}Lucky Hit: {/c}Your {c_important}Wolves'{/c} attacks have up to a {c_number}[{SF_10}|%|]{/c} chance to {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} you for {c_number}[{SF_17}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([Max(1,{fortified:MOD_B_FORTIFY})|0|]){/c}.
Mod4_Description: {c_important}Wolves{/c} deal {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to Immobilized, Stunned, Slowed, or Poisoned enemies.
desc:
{c_label}Cooldown: {/c}{c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat_Effect_Chance_Script_Formula_Override:16}|%|]{/c}
{/if}{c_label}Passive:{/c} Summon {c_number}{SF_0}{/c} wolf companions that bite enemies for {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE}{/c} damage.

{c_label}Active{/c}: Direct your wolves to focus an enemy, leaping to them and striking for {c_number}{payload:TOOLTIP_DAMAGE_LEAP}{/c} damage.
name: Wolves
